title: Activating esim on my Pixel 5
content:
Hi,
I live in Israel and I just bought a new Pixel 5 phone.
I'm trying to activate the esim with my carrier (Hot-Mobile) but fail to do it.
Hot-Mobile gave me a code I should use but for some reason I get a QR code scanner for TELEKOM.DE...
Can you please tell me what I'm doing wrong?
Thanks!
